
** Content Hub
HTML and Rmd configurable templates to create a central place to display and link to content,
to then be displayed on a Shiny, Rstudio Connect or GitHub server. 

***Usage
This website template utilizes configuration files to rearrange and display content.

- config.yml: This file contains the main configuration for displaying content.
The `featured` section is for the content to view in the carousel front page,
and the `docs` section defines the content to display the .
